query:
SELECT 
  t.fullName,
  LENGTH(tb.lifeStory) as lifeStoryLength,
  LENGTH(tb.historicalContext) as contextLength,
  JSON_LENGTH(tb.keyLifeEvents) as eventsCount,
  JSON_LENGTH(tb.influencesReceived) as influencesCount
FROM teachers t
LEFT JOIN teacher_biographies tb ON t.id = tb.teacherId
ORDER BY t.fullName
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.9bb51d851611 --database my7vf9kVVC5tHsnhvudijY --execute SELECT 
  t.fullName,
  LENGTH(tb.lifeStory) as lifeStoryLength,
  LENGTH(tb.historicalContext) as contextLength,
  JSON_LENGTH(tb.keyLifeEvents) as eventsCount,
  JSON_LENGTH(tb.influencesReceived) as influencesCount
FROM teachers t
LEFT JOIN teacher_biographies tb ON t.id = tb.teacherId
ORDER BY t.fullName
LIMIT 10;
